name: Dungeon Crawler (MariuszGaljan)
description:
This is a demo of a dungeon crawler game. You play as a sorcerer whose task is to wipe out a troublesome tribe of goblins from the dungeon.

In your arsenal, you have 4 types of runes, one for each element: fire, water, earth and air (in the demo, you only have fire and air). You can combine them to create new spells and vanquish your foes!

You win the game by killing all the goblins. You lose the game by death.
